2.4.1.2 Describe the life cycle of a plant

2.4.2.2 Mention some animals which depend on others for food.

2.4.2.4 Mention places where wild animals are found
2.4.2.5 Explain how animals protect themselves from their enemies
2.4.2.6 Explain the importance of conserving wild life.

2.5.2.2 Distinguish between different sounds.
